text: Potamonautes lividus is a species of decapod in the family Potamonautidae. The IUCN conservation status of Potamonautes lividus is "VU", vulnerable. The species faces a high risk of endangerment in the medium term. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Decapods Category:Articles created by Qbugbot Category:Crustaceans described in 2001
title: Potamonautes lividus
